PageTitle: peer advertise-ext-community (BGP-VPN instance IPv4 address family view)
FuncDef:
The peer advertise-ext-community command enables a device to advertise an extended community attribute to its peer.
The undo peer advertise-ext-community command cancels the existing configuration. The peer advertise-ext-community command enables a device to advertise an extended community attribute to its peer. The undo peer advertise-ext-community command cancels the existing configuration. By default, a device advertises no extended community attribute its peer or peer group.
ParentView: BGP-VPN instance IPv4 address family view

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies an IPv4 peer address.
The value is in dotted decimal notation.

ExtraInfo: The peer advertise-ext-community command is used to advertise the extended community attribute to a specified peer or peer group.
